name: kite
description: Python programming copilot â€” Kite shows cloud-powered completions, documentation, and examples.

enableCompletions.title: Enable Completions
enableCompletions.description: Show auto-completions from Kite as Atom suggestions

displayExpandViewAs.description: This setting defines how the Kite expanded view will be displayed in Atom.

sidebarPosition.description: When `Display Expand View As` is set to `sidebar` this setting defines where to place the sidebar in the Atom UI.

sidebarWidth.description: When `Display Expand View As` is set to `sidebar` this setting defines the width of the sidebar.

openSidebarOnStartup.description: When `Display Expand View As` is set to `sidebar` this setting will make the sidebar appears on startup.

loggingLevel.description: The verbosity level of Kite's logs.
